name: CommBridge Language Services
tag_list: certified-translators, certified-interpreters, translation, interpretation, translator, interpreter, translation-company, translation-agency, translating, interpreting, arizona
overview:
Translation and interpretation services in more than 50 languages.

CommBridge Language Services is a fast growing translation and interpretation company located in the Phoenix, Arizona metro area. We are certified by the SBA, members of the American Translators Association, the Greater Phoenix Chamber of Commerce, and other professional organizations.

Language Services:

Certified and notarized translations by certified translators Legal, Medical, and Conference Interpreters nationwide Editing and proofreading services Website and Software Localization Cultural Consulting
